text: Culver is an extinct town in Bates County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. Culver was founded in the 1890s, and named after A H. Culver, a local storekeeper. A post office called Culver was established in 1894, and remained in operation until 1901. ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Missouri Category:Former populated places in Bates County, Missouri
title: Culver, Missouri
